title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the 49ers trading for All-Pro RB Christian McCaffrey and why San Francisco is ready to go all in on winning the Super Bowl right now. He downplays the yelling match between Kyler Murray and Kliff Kingsbury on the sidelines of their win over the Saints on Thursday Night Football. He also gives you his Blazing 5 picks for week 7 of the NFL season. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl Champion Chris Long joins the show to give his thoughts on the McCaffrey trade and if he's surprised by the undefeated Eagles this year. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
